content: have you ever heard of an axolotl they re the cutest little pink salamanders from mexico that you have ever seen because not all of us can have an aquarium to house one here is a pattern to make your own axolotl this pattern uses worsted weight yarn and a 3 5mm hook the finished salamander is about 10 inches long and 2 inches at its widest point not including the gills because everything is sewn on it is suitable for children of all ages as well as that adult lover of cute things enjoy
